snippet.title: Ghostrunner 2 - Ice Pack DLC Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/ghostrunner-2/

The Ghostrunner 2 Ice Pack and free Hardcore mode launch today on Playstation 5. Watch the Ice Pack trailer now.
 
Upgrade your Cyber-Ninja adventure with 3 new sword and glove sets and a new motorcycle skin. Featuring the Ice Tarantula, Black Widow, and Web Cutter sword and glove sets. Ride through Dharma Tower and the Cyberpunk Wasteland in style with the new Motorcycle Design IC3 skin with cool new ice combat effects.
 
Try Brutal edition or get the Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass which includes 4 cosmetic DLC packs and 1 unforgettable game mode.   
 
The Hardcore Mode update will also launches today for all players after completing the main story. The new Hardcore Mode will feature a significant increase in difficulty, rearranged level designs with different enemy placements, platforming objects, hazards, and more. To help players overcome this incredible new challenge Jack will wield all upgrades and abilities from the very start!
 
Set one year after the critically acclaimed sci-fi smash, Ghostrunner 2 sees cyber ninja protagonist Jack emerging from the deathtrap of Dharma Tower for the first time to explore the sprawling wasteland beyond.
 
Be under no illusion…. Blood will run.

#ps5 #ps5games #ghostrunner2 

Rated Mature
